effect.diamond_pearl: Heals the user for half its max HP.
effect.platinum: Heals the user for half its max HP.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Heals the user for half its max HP.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Heals the user by half its max HP.
short_effect.platinum: Heals the user by half its max HP.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Heals the user by half its max HP.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP. May be used in the field to heal HP.
flavor_text.platinum: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP. It may also be used to heal an ally’s HP.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP. It may also be used to heal an ally’s HP.
